title: 'EXCELLENT BUY
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars'
column5: Have Been Using Since last month, Writing review after absolute use of the same. The Sofa Cum bed is an Excellent Product. Very Comfortable and sturdy too. and best thing that it converts into Sofa, Couch and Bed. So all NEEDS ARE MET IN A SINGLE PRODUCT.  A must buy for those who are looking a Good looking furniture (All in one) to add beauty in their Homes. Design is too good, First i was little skeptical about its sturdiness,. but it is actually well built and strong enough.  With this Sofa Cum bed all my needs are met. so I didn't had to buy all these separately. it is budget friendly too.  Thank You for the Beautiful Product.
